# Required Packages
## Installable through repos
```
sudo apt install zsh \
    polybar wmctrl slop x11-utils \
    rofi \
    alacritty \
    tmux
```

## From source or find a .deb
xfce4-docklike-plugin  
zen browser  
kickstart neovim  

## Generic Themeing
Font: JetBrainsMono NF  
GTK-Theme: Orchis-Grey-Dark-Compact  
Icons: Gnome  

## Misc
ohmyzsh
